statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions_and_feedback WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_interactions_and_feedback WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions_and_feedback;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time FROM user_interactions_and_feedback ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(interaction_type) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions_and_feedback GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions_and_feedback WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_interactions_and_feedback WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM user_interactions_and_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, feedback_text FROM user_interactions_and_feedback WHERE interaction_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, feedback_text FROM user_interactions_and_feedback WHERE interaction_type IN ('comment', 'share') ORDER BY user_id ASC, interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, feedback FROM user_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, user_id, feedback, interaction_date FROM user_interactions;
SELECT * FROM ar_brand_experiences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT brand_name, rating FROM ar_brand_experiences ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT user_id, brand_name, feedback FROM ar_brand_experiences WHERE rating > 3 AND user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' AND feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM ar_brand_experiences GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, experience_type, experience_date FROM brand_experiences WHERE experience_type = 'Positive' ORDER BY experience_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%click%'
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE 'click%' AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_date) as last_interaction_date FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;

SELECT experience_id, user_id, experience_type FROM brand_experiences UNION SELECT feedback_id, user_id, 'feedback' as experience_type FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date > (SELECT MAX(interaction_date) FROM user_interactions) ORDER BY user_id ASC, experience_id DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_interactions ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT experience_name, experience_rating FROM ar_experiences WHERE experience_rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, theme_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_preference = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT experience_name, AVG(experience_rating) AS avg_rating FROM ar_experiences GROUP BY experience_name HAVING AVG(experience_rating) > 4.5 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme_preference, language_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_preference = TRUE;
SELECT u.user_id, u.action_type, u.action_timestamp, f.feedback_text FROM user_interactions u JOIN user_feedback f ON u.user_id = f.user_id ORDER BY action_timestamp ASC, feedback_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, feedback_date, feedback_details FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM ar_experiences WHERE experience_type = 'Indoor' ORDER BY experience_name;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date FROM user_ar_history WHERE experience_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, experience_id FROM user_ar_history ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 'd7f24a8a-54c2-49c4-9017-e155e3ecf2e7';
